text: the Incredible Hulk is a new movie
directed by Louis Leterrier II now
she'll say about a scientist named Bruce
Banner and when he gets very angry in
its pulse rate crosses 200 gets big and
green and monstrous now this may sound
familiar about five years ago a movie
came out about a scientist named Bruce
Banner who has the same affliction it
was directed by Angley and it was called
the Hulk but this one which is also
based on the Marvel comic book is called
The Incredible Hulk and it stars Edward
Norton as banner also lived Tyler as his
girlfriend Betty Ross and William Hart
as her dad a gruff army general who's
responsible for the research program
that God Bruce Banner turned into the
Hulk in the first place
now this movie I have to say is not very
incredible it didn't make me turn green
and angry and storm out of a theater in
a rage smashing things but it also
didn't have the kind of pop magic that
the best comic book based movies do and
it's partly just because the main
character didn't have a very interesting
drama going you think about what happens
with spider-man and Peter Parker or
Bruce Wayne and Batman a lot of the real
interest in superhero movies beyond the
special effects and the big fights and
all of that has to do with what happens
to the character with the kind of
identity crisis that he goes through and
with Bruce Banner at least as portrayed
by Edward Norton nothing very
interesting happened
there's no real continuity between
Banner and the Hulk so the movie just
feels very average it sort of goes
through all of the motions that you
expect from this genre the CGI special
effects are okay but somehow this big
green muscular creature just isn't very
compelling or convincing and the whole
movie you might say it's credible enough
but it's far from incredible and the
only reason I think to see it is if you
just can't wait you've already seen Iron
Man six times
Hellboy and the next Batman movie are
still a few weeks off and so you just
desperately need to see something with a
superhero and if that's the case I
suppose help yourself to the Incredible
Hulk
